Title: Requires public schools to start no earlier than eight thirty a.m. and that no public high school within the state shall start before an elementary school starts within the same school district
Summary: Requires public schools to start no earlier than eight thirty a.m. and that no public high school within the state shall start before an elementary school starts within the same school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring public schools to start no earlier than eight thirty a.m. and that no public high school within the state shall start before an elementary school starts within the same school district
